dct_description_sm: This line data layer represents the shoreline of Lake Michigan in 2006. The dataset was originally published by the Great Lakes Information Network on December 12, 2006.[NOAA's Medium Resolution Digital Shoreline is a high-quality, general use digital vector dataset compiled from NOAA Nautical Charts, created by the Strategic Environmental Assessments Division of NOAA's Office of Ocean Resources, Conservation and Assessment. Nominal mapping scale is 1:70,000.]
